comments:
The scenario was: 
I was working with g-Eclipse and had JSDL file opened in multieditor. I closed g-Eclipse (form my development Eclipse, pressing "Terminate" in the Console view) and then started it again - I got an error dialog with message, that Editor cannot be created due to some errors (not much of an information). 
File I had in editor is proper JSDL file (I attach it)

I didn't manage to repeat this error.

Here is the error log:

Created an attachment (id=69675)
JSDL file

Editor was trying to open this file when faild.

Resolved in Bug #: 190777

The above exception was due to a typo error concerning the JsdlMultiPageEditor ID specified in the 'eu.geclipse.jsdl.ui' plugin.xml
